extension.description: Kodi video plugin for the website Focus.de
This plugin allow to browse and watch videos from Mediaset Play website
Questo plugin permette di sfogliare e visualizzare i video presenti sul sito di Mediaset Play
extension.news: 1.2.0 - 21/12/2018 - Cambiato approccio per canali Live (i link usati in precedenza non ritornano ora 404), i nuovi link sembrano bloccati dall'estero 1.2.1 - 02/01/2019 - Fix riproduzione video su Android con versioni di Kodi superiori alla 17 (ora utilizza InputStreamAdactive sempre su Android) 1.2.2 - 11/06/2019 - Aggiunta compatibilita' Python 3 e retrocompatibilita' Python 2.

extension.description: Ermöglicht den Zugriff auf fast alle deutschen Mediatheken der öffentlich Rechtlichen basierend auf der Datenbank von MediathekView.de
Gives access to most video-platforms from German public service broadcasters using the database of MediathekView.de
Fornisce l'accesso a gran parte delle piattaforme video operate dalle emittenti pubbliche tedesche usando la banca dati di MediathekView.de
extension.news: v.0.6.2 (2019-03-10): - Bugfix: Entpacken von GZ-Archiven auf FireTV 4K und ähnliche Geräte funktioniert nun wieder - Bugfix: mvupdate funktioniert nun wieder - Compliance: Code Kompatibilität für zukünftige Kodi Versionen mit Python 3 v.0.6.1 (2019-03-08): - Bugfix: Fixed module exception due to case error v0.6.0 (2019-03-01): - Feature: Cache der Anfragen für lokale Datenbanken - Feature: Natives ultraschnelles Update für SQLite - Bugfix: Live Streams konnten heruntergeladen werden - Bugfix: Auf Kodi 18 hat der automatische Aktualisierungsmodus nicht mehr funktioniert - Feature: Neue option --full um ein vollstndiges Update zu erzwingen - Feature: Neue Aktualisierungsmethode "Zeitgesteuert" - Bugfix: Es war nicht möglich, den Aktualisierungsintervall bei der Methode "Automatisch" einzustellen - Feature: Passende Symbole für alle Menü-Einträge

extension.news: 0.0.1 - 21/11/2019 - Initial version - added TV Livestream 0.1.0 - 23/11/2019 - added Videos and Magazines 0.1.1 - 24/11/2019 - added 'Magazyn wojskowy' and 'Zawod zolnierz' 0.1.2 - 26/11/2019 - workaround for certificate erros 0.2.0 - 01/12/2019 - refactoring due to complete youtube video hosting by TVR

[add] send PlaybackInit, PlaybackStarted, PlaybackStopped notifications containing video id, channel id, and the status of the playing video [fix] allow playback regardless of API status - fixes playback for strm, playlists, other add-ons, and sharing videos from devices [fix] finding player config, allow playback to continue when not found if possible [fix] fix possible loop due to invalid keys and login information [fix] fix playback of mpeg-dash streams if HTTP Server - Listen on IP is blank [upd] use a dialog to notify users of API key requirements with link to wiki - https://ytaddon.page.link/keys [rem] remove provided api keys [lang] de_de strings |contrib: tweimer| [lang] el_gr strings |contrib: twilight0| [lang] hu_hu strings |contrib: thelacesz| [lang] pl_pl strings |contrib: drrak|

extension.news: 1.0.1 (24-03-2020) - Added the Polish TV addons, namely TVP.pl (by mbebe), WP Pilot and TVP SPORT (by cod34fun). 1.0.2 (24-03-2020) - Added the Italian TV addons, namely Rai Play (by Nightflyer, cttynul, maxbambi, fabpolli) and Mediaset Play (by kodi-bino, cttynul). 1.0.3 (24-03-2020) - Added the YouTube addon (by anxdpanic, bromix). 1.0.4 (06-04-2020) - Added the Amazon VOD addon (by Sandmann79, Varstahl). 1.0.5 (07-04-2020) - Added dependencies for Amazon VOD addon. 1.0.6 (07-04-2020) - Changed version of Kodi-Six (down to 0.0.5) and TVP SPORT (up to 0.0.11). 1.0.7 (07-04-2020) - Added the MediathekView addon (by MediathekView.de, Leo Moll) 1.0.8 (13-04-2020) - Added the Focus Online addon

extension.summary: Iterative JSON parser with a standard Python iterator interface

extension.summary: Kodi InputStream and DRM playback made easy
Kodi InputStream und DRM Wiedergabe einfach gemacht
Βοηθός Inputstream για το Kodi και εύκολη αναπαραγωγή DRM
La lecture Kodi InputStream et DRM en toute simplicité
extension.description: A simple Kodi module that makes life easier for add-on developers relying on InputStream based add-ons and DRM playback.
Dieses einfache Kodi-Modul macht das Leben für Addon Entwickler einfacher, die auf InputStream basierte Addons und DRM Wiedergabe angewiesen sind.
Μία απλή μονάδα για το Kodi η οποία διευκολύνει την ζωή των προγραμματιστών οι οποίοι εξαρτώνται από τα πρόσθετσ InputStream και αναπαραγωγή τύπου DRM.
Простой модуль для Kodi, который облегчает жизнь разработчикам дополнений, с использованием InputStream дополнений и воспроизведения DRM контента.
Un simple module Kodi qui simplifie la vie des développeurs de modules complémentaires en s’appuyant sur des modules complémentaires basés sur InputStream et sur la lecture de DRM.
extension.news: v0.4.4 (2020-03-01) - Added option to restore a previously installed Widevine version - Improve progress bar when extracting Widevine on ARM devices - Improve Widevine library version detection - Improve InputStream Helper information - Increase download reliability for Chrome OS on ARM devices - Added Japanese, Korean, Croatian and Hungarian translations - Updated existing translations - Various small bugfixes for Widevine installation on ARM devices

extension.description: Pure Python JavaScript Translator/Interpreter
extension.news: 09/03/2020 - Bugfix by ostvanc in version 6.03.0: removed local library "pyjsparser" due to parsing errors

extension.summary: Wrappers around Kodi Python API for seamless Python 2/3 compatibility
extension.description: Wrappers around Kodi Python API that normalize handling of textual and byte strings in Python 2 and 3.
extension.news: 0.0.5: - Fixed Unicode decode errors when Kodi API returns non-UTF-8 byte strings. 0.0.4: - Implemented lazy patching of Kodi API functions and classes.

extension.summary: A Python library for automating interaction with websites.

extension.description: MySQL Connector/Python is implementing the MySQL Client/Server protocol completely in Python. This means you don't have to compile anything or MySQL (client library) doesn't even have to be installed on the machine.

extension.summary: PyAutoGUI is a cross-platform GUI automation Python module for human beings. Used to programmatically control the mouse and keyboard.
A pure python module which implements the DES and Triple-DES encryption algorithms.

extension.description: Packed for Kodi from https://github.com/PiotrDabkowski/pyjsparser
The purpose of Pyperclip is to provide a cross-platform Python module for copying and pasting text to the clipboard.

pytz brings the Olson tz database into Python. This library allows accurate and cross platform timezone calculations using Python 2.4 or higher. It also solves the issue of ambiguous times at the end of daylight saving time, which you can read more about in the Python Library Reference (datetime.tzinfo).
extension.disclaimer: Use at your own risk. The authors accept no liability. May cause permanent and/or catastrophic damage. Side effects include, but are not limited to loss of memory, seizures, sudden fits of rage, sudden fits of melancholy, inability to recall prominent capital cities, lack of respect for authority, fear of cats, temporary and/or permanent black outs. Avoid inhalation. Use in a well ventilated space. Keep away from small children.

extension.description: PyXBMCt is a mini-framework for simple XBMC addon UI buliding. It is similar to PyQt and provides parent windows, a number of UI controls (widgets) and a grid layout manager to place controls.
Packed for KODI from https://github.com/kennethreitz/requests
A handy Python module with utilites for the Requests module.

Six is a Python 2 and 3 compatibility library. It provides utility functions for smoothing over the differences between the Python versions with the goal of writing Python code that is compatible on both Python versions. See the documentation for more information on what is provided.

extension.summary: Python Module to find out the current time zone
extension.description: Packed for Kodi from https://github.com/regebro/tzlocal
